# PED::GET_PED_CAUSE_OF_DEATH

## Summary
Retrieves the weapon that killed the ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **WEAPON_TYPE**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the hash of the weapon/model/object that killed the ped.
